A1 the number 14: Her baby is fourteen months old. Luisa is going to be fourteen next month.
More examplesFewer examplesthirteen, fourteen, fifteenAfter fourteen days the eggs hatch.At the age of fourteen I had never even been on a train, much less an aircraft.The figures have risen by fourteen percent.The book cost fourteen pounds.
